title: Can I use ink made by a different manufacturer in a Mont Blanc pen? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is nothing in terms of materials used in a Mont Blanc pens that is different from all other fountain pens. So, if an ink works in other fountain pens, it should work in a Mont Blanc. So, if an ink is made for fountain pens (as against dip pens, in which case, it may be thick and may also clog the insides easily) then it should work with a Mont Blanc. I do not own a Mont Blanc, but I know people who own Mont Blancs and use non-Mont Blanc inks without problem. Further, first hand feedback on this specific question is already available on fountainpennetwork.com, for instance there is a thread that goes “other ink in Mont Blanc fp”..
